task.title: Enabling use of the command-line interface

taskbody.context: This procedure enables users to perform administrative tasks with the command-line interface by adding individual users to the docker group.

step.cmd: Log in to the master host .
Add users to the Docker group, docker.

stepxmp.p: Replace User with the name of a login account on the host.

step.info: Repeat the preceding command for each user to add.
